item.title: Part 2. Project management basics
item.description: I. Values, needs, phases of project management and the steps in managing a project II. The basics phrases of the project management III. Project manager IV. Project organization and team in project management V. Project planning, scheduling, monitoring and controlling VI. Project controlling, project evaluation and termination VII. Concept, definition, and types of research projects I. Values, needs, phases of project management and the steps in managing a project II.
